thread.section_title: The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfectly wonderful
thread.title_full: Perfectly wonderful - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: janelevron
title: Perfectly wonderful
text: My husband and I stayed at the Royal Park from March 21-28, 2017. We arrived late and were expected and welcomed. Our room was lovely, the furniture was comfortable and elegant, and the bathroom was clean and spacious. The Location is prefect - Hyde and Kensington Parks are a short walk away as is Paddington underground station and the neighborhood is beautiful. Nearby are a variety of very good restaurants. The staff is friendly and helpful, the breakfast is varied and delicious. We would definitely be happy to stay there again.
